meta_about_description: Through your loved one’s stories, cemeteries are becoming places of inspiration. Explore our Memory walk to discover beautiful and unknown stories! Available on mobile apps.
hero_subtitle:
Explore our Memory walk to discover beautiful and unknown stories!

 Available on mobile apps.
partners_heading: We have saved beautiful memories from these partners:
testimonial_1_text: Until now, the only people that aren't forgotten are famous ones. We believe that every person has a story worth telling and remembering.
article_heading_1: Through your loved one’s stories, cemeteries are becoming places of inspiration.
article_heading_2: Loved one’s lives as a guiding light to future generations.
article_heading_3: Download Spiritus App to visit Memory Walk.
article_heading_3_list_element_1: Share your loved one’s stories and photographs.
article_heading_3_list_element_2: Search grave locations on local and worldwide cemeteries.
